entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain early this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.
